description.en: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.ar: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.br: Concede um aumento de +0,25% de Acerto Crítico e +0,25% de Velocidade de Ataque quando aplicada em Arma ou Escudo perfurado.
description.cns: 暴击率+0.2%, 攻击速度+0.25%(放置在武器或盾牌穿洞槽时)
description.de: Verleiht +0,2 Kritische Trefferrate, +0,2 Angriffstempo wenn angewendet auf eine gesockelte Waffe oder Schild.
description.fi: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.

description.fr: Chances de Coups Critique et Vitesse d'Attaque augmentée de +0.2%, en glissant la carte dans un emplacement percé de votre arme ou armure.
description.id: Memberikan +0,2% Critical Chance, +0,25% Attack Speed saat digunakan pada senjata atau perisai yang ditembus.
description.it: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.jp: 武器や盾に装着するとクリティカル率/攻撃速度+0.25%
description.kr: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.nl: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.pl: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.ru: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.sp: Otorga +0.2 % Probabilidad Crítica, +0.25 % Velocidad de Ataque cuando se aplica a un arma o escudo perforado.
description.sw: Gives +0.2% Critical Chance, +0.25% Attack Speed when applied to a pierced weapon or shield.
description.th: โอกาสติดคริติคอล +0.25% , +0.25% ความเร็วการโจมตี เมื่อใส่ลงในอาวุธหรือโล่ที่ถูกเจาะแล้ว
description.tw: 當應用於精煉武器或盾牌時，提供 +0.2% 暴擊率和 +0.25% 攻擊速度。
